NovraDeviceCommunicationsLibrary Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
A75_RFSettingRF Configuration Structure for an A75 device
A75_StatusThe status structure for an A75 device
FWD_InfoUDP/IP forwarding information for a raw data PID
Novra_DeviceEntryEssential information for talking to a Novra device
Novra_DeviceListA list of Novra_DeviceEntry
PesMaker_PIDListThe PID list structure used for an S75 Version 5.X device (PesMaker)
PesMaker_StatusThe status structure for an S75 Version 5.x device (PesMaker)
PIDDestinationA destination where a PID should be sent
PIDRouteIdentifies where a PID should be sent. Each bit in the DestinationMask corresponds to an entry in the destination list. A bit value of 0 means the PID does not go to the corresponding destination; while a 1 means it does
S75_ProgramListA list of DVB programs
S75_RFSetting_JLEORF Configuration Structure for an S75 JLeo device
S75_Status_JLEOStatus Structure used by JLEO devices
S75_TrapSetting_JLEOThe trap setting structure for JLEO devices
S75CA_ProgramListThe program list structure for an S75CA device
S75D_NetSettingNetwork Configuration Structure for an S75 Version 2.X device
S75D_NetSetting_V3Network Configuration Structure for an S75 Version 3 device
S75D_PIDListThe PID list structure used for an S75 Version 2.X device
S75D_RFSettingRF Configuration Structure for an S75 Version 2.X device
S75D_RFSetting_V3RF Configuration Structure for an S75 Version 3 device
S75D_StatusThe status structure for an S75 Version 2.X device
S75D_Status_V3The status structure for an S75 Version 3 device
S75FK_KeyListThe key list structure for an S75FK device
S75Plus_PIDListThe PID list structure used for an S75Plus device. This structure is also used by devices that support the Pro feature set. Devices that don't support the Pro feature set will ignore the destination information and will assume all control flags are set to 1 (MPE)
S75Plus_RFSettingRF Configuration Structure for an S75 Plus device
S75Plus_StatusThe status structure for an S75Plus device
S75PlusPro_PATThe PAT structure for an S75PlusPro device
S75PlusPro_TrapSettingThe trap setting structure for S75PlusPro device. NOTE: THIS FEATURE IS NOT CURRENTLY SUPPORTED IN DEVICE FIRMWARE
